title: Chicken kiev with mashed potato and green beans
description: Chicken kiev is a lot easier to make than you may think and tastes so much better than shop-bought, plus your efforts will be rewarded with garlic butter goodness.
ingredients: 4 x 225g/8oz chicken breasts, wing bone left in but skin removed
salt and freshly ground black pepper
100g/3½oz white bread, crusts removed, dried and processed into breadcrumbs
